ygData.subject: Re: Good to see...good to see
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of women.....There is one big question I have.....why do guys play girl characters....some say they are role playing.....do they also dress up in
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of women.....There is one big question I have.....why do guys play girl characters....some say they are role playing.....do they also dress up in womens close and role play women in real life? or is "role playing" a female the first step towards role playing a real life female? I know there are a lot of legitimate female players, but I'd bet a large sum of money that most of the female characters are being driven by guys.....call me homophobic if you will, but I think its weird.

>>> <suzkim@...> 5.19.99 12:47:10 PM >>>
From: suzkim@...

Hail,

It was good to see another of the female gender with a passion for
slashin an bashing!
Currently on a mission to get my four bubbles for dual attack and dual
weild *snickers*.

*grumbles*
gotta take care of some RL stuff so I can hunt.. hunt..hunt

Azlana, Barbarian Warrior of Veeshan
